marvel_heroes.title: Marvel Heroes
marvel_heroes.description: Superheroes from the Marvel Universe defending justice and protecting innocents

cable.title: Cable
cable.metadata: Time Soldier | Cyborg | Plasma Rifle | Military | Grey Blue | Future Warrior
cable.content:
Cable

The gruff time-traveling soldier who fights to prevent a dystopian future

Cable is a muscular cyborg with a scarred soldier appearance featuring a distinctive cybernetic arm that marks his origin from a dark future timeline. His core motivation is preventing dystopian future, embodying the gruff time-traveling soldier archetype with battle-hardened experience and urgent mission focus. He wears military gear with tech and cybernetic arm and weapons serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in grey and blue military colors. His abilities center on time travel and heavy weapons, typically armed with plasma rifle and cybernetic arm for futuristic combat. His character design draws inspiration from military sci-fi and Terminator aesthetics.

• Key Traits: Time travel abilities, heavy weapons expertise, cybernetic enhancements
• Signature Look: Muscular cyborg in military gear with cybernetic arm
• Primary Role: Preventing dystopian future through time-traveling military operations

captain_america.title: Captain America
captain_america.metadata: Super Soldier | Vibranium Shield | Patriotic | Red White Blue | Leadership | All-American
captain_america.content:
Captain America

The all-American hero who defends freedom and justice with unwavering moral conviction

Captain America is an athletic super-soldier with a blonde patriotic hero appearance that embodies the ideals and values of American democracy. His primary motivation is defending freedom and justice, embodying the all-American hero archetype with enhanced physical capabilities and moral leadership. He wears a red, white, blue uniform with star-spangled costume and shield serving as his main iconic features, creating the ultimate patriotic superhero appearance. His abilities include enhanced physicals and leadership, typically armed with his legendary vibranium shield for both offense and defense. His character design draws directly from American patriotic symbols and democratic ideals.

• Key Traits: Enhanced physical abilities, moral leadership, patriotic dedication
• Signature Look: Athletic super-soldier in star-spangled red, white, and blue uniform
• Primary Role: Defending American ideals and leading heroes in the fight for freedom

colossus.title: Colossus
colossus.metadata: X-Man | Organic Steel | Gentle Giant | Russian | Silver Metallic | Super Strength
colossus.content:
Colossus

The gentle giant who protects mutants and innocents through organic steel transformation

Colossus is a large metallic build with Russian mutant metal skin that can transform into organic steel at will. His core motivation is protecting mutants and innocents, embodying the gentle giant archetype with immense physical power tempered by compassionate nature. He wears simple clothing or X-uniform with metallic skin transformation serving as his main distinctive ability, rendered in silver metallic colors. His abilities focus on organic steel form and super strength, typically fighting with bare hands in metal form that can withstand virtually any attack. His character design draws inspiration from Russian strongmen and steel workers.

• Key Traits: Organic steel transformation, super strength, gentle nature
• Signature Look: Large Russian mutant with metallic skin transformation ability
• Primary Role: Protecting fellow mutants while serving as X-Men powerhouse

cyclops.title: Cyclops
cyclops.metadata: X-Men Leader | Optic Blasts | Ruby Visor | Stoic | Blue Yellow | Tactical
cyclops.content:
Cyclops

The stoic leader who guides the X-Men toward peaceful coexistence between humans and mutants

Cyclops is an athletic mutant with a visor-wearing team leader appearance that reflects his role as tactical commander of the X-Men. His primary motivation is leading X-Men to peaceful coexistence, embodying the stoic leader archetype with unwavering dedication to Professor Xavier's dream. He wears X-Men uniform with ruby quartz visor serving as his main distinctive feature, rendered in blue and yellow X-Men colors. His abilities center on optic energy blasts controlled and focused through his specialized visor. His character design draws inspiration from military leaders and sci-fi heroes.

• Key Traits: Optic energy blasts, tactical leadership, strategic planning
• Signature Look: Athletic mutant in X-Men uniform with distinctive ruby quartz visor
• Primary Role: Leading X-Men in the fight for mutant-human peaceful coexistence

gambit.title: Gambit
gambit.metadata: X-Man | Kinetic Energy | Playing Cards | Cajun | Pink Black | Charming Rogue
gambit.content:
Gambit

The charming rogue who protects others through Cajun charm and kinetic energy powers

Gambit is an athletic Cajun with a trench coat wearing appearance that reflects his background as a reformed thief turned X-Men hero. His core motivation is charming and protecting through roguishness, embodying the charming rogue/thief archetype with street smarts and supernatural abilities. He wears trench coat and casual wear with distinctive trench coat serving as his signature feature, rendered in pink and black colors. His abilities focus on kinetic energy charging, typically armed with playing cards and bo staff that he charges with explosive energy. His character design draws inspiration from romantic rogues and gamblers.

• Key Traits: Kinetic energy charging, charming personality, street fighting skills
• Signature Look: Athletic Cajun in distinctive trench coat with casual wear
• Primary Role: Using reformed criminal skills and energy powers to protect innocents

hulk.title: Hulk
hulk.metadata: Monster Hero | Gamma Powers | Green Giant | Super Strength | Purple Pants | Savage
hulk.content:
Hulk

The savage protector who defends others through overwhelming gamma-powered force

Hulk is a massive muscular build with green giant appearance and torn clothes that result from his incredible size and strength. His primary motivation is protecting through overwhelming force, embodying the savage protector archetype with unlimited strength fueled by emotional intensity. He wears torn purple pants with massive green musculature serving as his main distinctive features, creating an iconic monster hero appearance. His abilities center on gamma-powered super strength, typically fighting with bare hands and environmental objects as weapons. His character design draws inspiration from Jekyll and Hyde mythology and classic monster archetypes.

• Key Traits: Gamma-powered super strength, emotional transformation, protective instincts
• Signature Look: Massive green giant with torn purple pants and incredible musculature
• Primary Role: Protecting innocents through raw power and savage determination

iceman.title: Iceman
iceman.metadata: X-Man | Ice Powers | Cool Jokester | Blue White | Thermal Control | Crystal Form
iceman.content:
Iceman

The cool-headed jokester who protects others through ice manipulation and thermal control

Iceman is an athletic ice-form build with ice-covered mutant hero appearance that allows him to transform his body into living ice. His core motivation is protecting through ice powers, embodying the cool-headed jokester archetype with both literal and figurative coolness under pressure. He wears ice armor or casual wear with ice crystal body covering serving as his main distinctive feature, rendered in blue and white ice colors. His abilities focus on ice manipulation and form control, typically using ice constructs and projectiles in combat. His character design draws inspiration from ice and winter elements.

• Key Traits: Ice manipulation, thermal control, humorous personality
• Signature Look: Athletic mutant with ice crystal body covering and frozen appearance
• Primary Role: Protecting fellow mutants while maintaining team morale through humor

iron_man.title: Iron Man
iron_man.metadata: Armored Avenger | Technology | Red Gold | Repulsors | Genius Billionaire | High-Tech
iron_man.content:
Iron Man

The genius billionaire hero who protects the world through advanced technology and powered armor

Iron Man is an athletic build encased in high-tech armored suit that represents the pinnacle of technological achievement and engineering excellence. His primary motivation is protecting world through technology, embodying the genius billionaire hero archetype with unlimited resources and brilliant intellect. He wears red and gold armor with sleek technological armor serving as his main distinctive features, creating an iconic high-tech superhero appearance. His abilities center on powered armor and repulsors, typically armed with armor weapons systems for versatile combat. His character design draws inspiration from high-tech armor and jet aircraft.

• Key Traits: Powered armor technology, repulsor systems, genius-level intellect
• Signature Look: Athletic build in sleek red and gold technological armor
• Primary Role: Protecting world through advanced technology and engineering innovation

spider_man.title: Spider-Man
spider_man.metadata: Wall-Crawler | Spider Powers | Web-Slinging | Red Blue | Responsibility | Wise-Cracking
spider_man.content:
Spider-Man

The wise-cracking hero who protects innocents guided by the principle of great responsibility

Spider-Man is an athletic acrobatic build with red and blue masked hero appearance that enables incredible feats of agility and wall-crawling. His core motivation is protecting innocents with great responsibility, embodying the wise-cracking hero archetype with humor that masks deep dedication to helping others. He wears red and blue spider suit with web pattern and spider symbol serving as his main iconic features. His abilities focus on spider powers and web-slinging, typically armed with web-shooters for both transportation and combat. His character design draws inspiration from spiders and acrobats.

• Key Traits: Spider powers, web-slinging, wise-cracking humor
• Signature Look: Athletic acrobat in red and blue spider suit with web patterns
• Primary Role: Protecting New York City while learning that with great power comes great responsibility

war_machine.title: War Machine
war_machine.metadata: Military Cyborg | Heavy Weapons | Grey Armor | Military Tech | War Machine | Tactical
war_machine.content:
War Machine

The military tech warrior who serves justice through overwhelming military might and firepower

War Machine is a bulky armored build with grey military-style armor that emphasizes firepower and tactical superiority over sleek design. His primary motivation is serving justice through military might, embodying the military tech warrior archetype with professional soldier discipline and advanced weaponry. He wears grey military armor with heavy weapons integration serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in grey and black military colors. His abilities center on military armor and heavy weapons, typically armed with integrated weapon systems for maximum battlefield effectiveness. His character design draws inspiration from military hardware and tanks.

• Key Traits: Military armor systems, heavy weapons integration, tactical expertise
• Signature Look: Bulky figure in grey military armor with integrated heavy weapons
• Primary Role: Providing military-grade firepower and tactical support for heroic operations

wolverine_adamantium.title: Wolverine
wolverine_adamantium.metadata: X-Man | Adamantium Claws | Healing Factor | Yellow Blue | Feral Warrior | Canadian
wolverine_adamantium.content:
Wolverine (Adamantium)

The feral Canadian warrior who protects others through savage combat and unbreakable claws

Wolverine is a compact muscular build with short Canadian appearance featuring metal claws that represent the fusion of human determination with technological enhancement. His core motivation is protecting through savage combat, embodying the feral Canadian warrior archetype with healing factor and adamantium-enhanced skeleton. He wears yellow and blue X-costume with distinctive hair and metal claws serving as his main recognizable features. His abilities focus on healing factor and adamantium claws, fighting with adamantium claw skeleton that can cut through virtually any material. His character design draws inspiration from wolverines and Canadian wilderness.

• Key Traits: Adamantium claws, healing factor, savage combat instincts
• Signature Look: Compact muscular figure in yellow and blue with distinctive metal claws
• Primary Role: Providing X-Men with uncompromising combat effectiveness and loyalty

marrow.title: Marrow
marrow.metadata: Morlocks | Bone Spikes | Punk Outcast | White Bones | Dark Clothing | Savage
marrow.content:
Marrow

The savage outcast who survives and protects fellow outcasts through bone spike generation

Marrow is an athletic punk build with bone spikes protruding from body that mark her as one of the underground Morlocks rejected by surface society. Her core motivation is surviving and protecting outcasts, embodying the savage outcast archetype with fierce independence and protective instincts. She wears punk/leather outfit with visible bone protrusions serving as her main distinctive features, rendered in white bones and dark clothing colors. Her abilities focus on bone spike generation, typically armed with bone weapons and spikes that grow from her own body. Her character design draws inspiration from punk rockers and body modification culture.

• Key Traits: Bone spike generation, punk rebellion, outcast protection
• Signature Look: Athletic punk figure with visible bone spikes protruding from body
• Primary Role: Protecting fellow outcasts while fighting for Morlock survival and acceptance

psylocke.title: Psylocke
psylocke.metadata: Psychic Ninja | Telepathy | Psychic Blades | Purple Black | Ninja Warrior | Asian
psylocke.content:
Psylocke

The psychic ninja warrior who fights evil through the fusion of psychic powers and martial arts

Psylocke is an athletic ninja build with purple-haired Asian ninja appearance that combines traditional martial arts mastery with powerful telepathic abilities. Her primary motivation is fighting evil through psychic martial arts, embodying the psychic ninja warrior archetype with mental and physical combat skills. She wears purple ninja outfit with psychic energy weapons serving as her main distinctive features, rendered in purple and black colors. Her abilities center on telepathy and psychic blades, typically armed with psychic katana and throwing knives that manifest her mental energy as physical weapons. Her character design draws inspiration from ninja warriors and psychics.

• Key Traits: Telepathic abilities, psychic blade manifestation, ninja martial arts
• Signature Look: Athletic ninja in purple outfit with psychic energy weapons
• Primary Role: Fighting evil through combination of psychic powers and ninja combat techniques

rogue.title: Rogue
rogue.metadata: X-Man | Power Absorption | Southern Belle | Green Yellow Brown | Deadly Touch | White Streaks
rogue.content:
Rogue

The Southern belle with deadly touch who learns to control dangerous powers responsibly

Rogue is an athletic Southern build with white-streaked hair and Southern style that reflects both her regional background and the physical manifestation of her dangerous abilities. Her core motivation is controlling dangerous powers responsibly, embodying the Southern belle with deadly touch archetype with warmth and strength despite lethal contact. She wears green and yellow X-costume with white hair streaks serving as her main distinctive features, rendered in green, yellow, and brown colors. Her abilities focus on power absorption through touch, fighting with bare hands that can absorb powers and memories from anyone she touches. Her character design draws inspiration from Southern belles and gothic elements.

• Key Traits: Power absorption through touch, Southern charm, dangerous contact
• Signature Look: Athletic Southern woman in X-costume with distinctive white hair streaks
• Primary Role: Learning to control deadly powers while protecting fellow X-Men

storm.title: Storm
storm.metadata: Weather Goddess | Weather Control | White Hair | White Blue | African | Tribal Leader
storm.content:
Storm

The weather goddess who protects mutants through mastery of atmospheric and weather control

Storm is a tall goddess-like build with white-haired African weather goddess appearance that marks her as one of the most powerful mutants with dominion over natural forces. Her primary motivation is protecting mutants through weather control, embodying the weather goddess/tribal leader archetype with elemental mastery and leadership wisdom. She wears white cape and bodysuit with flowing white hair and cape serving as her main distinctive features, rendered in white and blue colors. Her abilities center on weather manipulation, typically using weather and lightning that respond to her will. Her character design draws inspiration from African goddesses and weather deities.

• Key Traits: Weather manipulation, elemental mastery, tribal leadership
• Signature Look: Tall goddess-like figure with flowing white hair and cape
• Primary Role: Protecting mutants while commanding the very forces of nature

marvel_villains.title: Marvel Villains
marvel_villains.description: Dangerous antagonists and supernatural threats from the Marvel Universe

blackheart.title: Blackheart
blackheart.metadata: Demon | Dark Magic | Black Red | Spikes | Evil Corruption | Prince of Darkness
blackheart.content:
Blackheart

The demonic prince of darkness who spreads evil and corruption wherever he appears

Blackheart is a large demonic build with dark demon appearance featuring spikes that mark him as one of the most powerful supernatural threats in existence. His core motivation is spreading evil and corruption, embodying the demonic prince of darkness archetype with ancient malevolence and supernatural power. He wears minimal demonic armor with spikes and dark energy serving as his main menacing features, rendered in black and red colors. His abilities focus on dark magic and demon powers, typically using dark energy attacks that draw from supernatural sources. His character design draws inspiration from biblical and mythological demons.

• Key Traits: Dark magic powers, demonic corruption, supernatural malevolence
• Signature Look: Large demonic figure with spikes and dark energy emanation
• Primary Role: Spreading evil and corruption through supernatural demonic influence

doctor_doom.title: Doctor Doom
doctor_doom.metadata: Monarch | Technology Magic | Green Silver | Armored Dictator | Genius Intellect | Royal
doctor_doom.content:
Doctor Doom

The aristocratic dictator who seeks to rule the world through technological and mystical superiority

Doctor Doom is a tall armored build with armored monarch appearance featuring a cape that combines royal bearing with technological supremacy. His primary motivation is ruling world through superiority, embodying the aristocratic dictator archetype with genius intellect and unlimited ambition. He wears full body armor and cape with metal mask and royal cape serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in green and silver colors. His abilities combine technology, magic, and genius intellect, typically armed with armor systems and magic for supreme versatility. His character design draws inspiration from medieval armor and dictators.

• Key Traits: Technological supremacy, mystical knowledge, genius-level intellect
• Signature Look: Tall armored monarch in full body armor with metal mask and royal cape
• Primary Role: Conquering the world through superior technology and magical knowledge

juggernaut.title: Juggernaut
juggernaut.metadata: Unstoppable Force | Super Strength | Brown Red Armor | Domed Helmet | Momentum | Brute
juggernaut.content:
Juggernaut

The unstoppable brute who destroys everything in his path through overwhelming momentum

Juggernaut is a massive hulking build with armored giant appearance featuring a helmet that makes him a living force of destruction. His core motivation is destroying everything in path, embodying the unstoppable brute archetype with momentum that cannot be halted by any obstacle. He wears heavy armor and helmet with distinctive domed helmet serving as his main recognizable feature, rendered in brown and red armor colors. His abilities center on unstoppable momentum, typically fighting with bare hands and mass that can demolish any barrier. His character design draws inspiration from medieval siege engines and bulldozers.

• Key Traits: Unstoppable momentum, overwhelming mass, destructive force
• Signature Look: Massive hulking figure in heavy armor with distinctive domed helmet
• Primary Role: Destroying obstacles through pure unstoppable momentum and brute force

magneto.title: Magneto
magneto.metadata: Mutant Supremacist | Magnetic Control | Purple Red | Cape Helmet | Nazi Survivor | Master
magneto.content:
Magneto

The magnetic master who seeks to achieve mutant dominance through electromagnetic supremacy

Magneto is a tall commanding build with cape-wearing mutant master appearance that reflects his role as both Holocaust survivor and mutant supremacist leader. His primary motivation is achieving mutant dominance, embodying the magnetic master/Nazi survivor archetype with the conviction that only mutant rule can prevent another genocide. He wears purple costume and cape with distinctive helmet and cape serving as his main iconic features, rendered in purple and red colors. His abilities focus on magnetic manipulation, typically using magnetic fields and metal control to reshape the battlefield. His character design draws inspiration from classical villains and Nazi imagery.

• Key Traits: Magnetic field manipulation, metal control, mutant supremacy ideology
• Signature Look: Tall commanding figure in purple costume with distinctive helmet and cape
• Primary Role: Leading mutant supremacist movement through electromagnetic mastery

omega_red.title: Omega Red
omega_red.metadata: Soviet Super-Soldier | Death Spores | Red Silver | Carbonadium Coils | Pale Russian | Vampiric
omega_red.content:
Omega Red

The death-dealing Soviet who spreads death and destruction through carbonadium coil attacks

Omega Red is a muscular Soviet build with pale Russian appearance featuring metal coils that represent the ultimate expression of Cold War super-soldier experimentation. His core motivation is spreading death and destruction, embodying the death-dealing Soviet archetype with life-draining abilities and nihilistic purpose. He wears Soviet military elements with carbonadium coil tentacles serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in red and silver colors. His abilities center on death spores and carbonadium coils, typically using carbonadium tentacle coils to drain life energy from victims. His character design draws inspiration from Soviet super-soldiers and vampires.

• Key Traits: Death spore emission, carbonadium coil attacks, life energy drainage
• Signature Look: Muscular pale figure with Soviet military elements and metal tentacle coils
• Primary Role: Spreading death and destruction through Soviet-engineered super-soldier abilities

sabretooth.title: Sabretooth
sabretooth.metadata: Feral Mutant | Claws Healing | Brown Orange Fur | Wild Hair | Predator | Savage
sabretooth.content:
Sabretooth

The savage predator who hunts and kills for pleasure using enhanced feral abilities

Sabretooth is a large feral build with wild-haired bestial mutant appearance that embodies the dark side of evolutionary enhancement and predatory instincts. His primary motivation is hunting and killing for pleasure, embodying the savage predator archetype with enhanced abilities used for cruel purposes. He wears minimal fur-lined clothing with wild hair and fangs serving as his main menacing features, rendered in brown and orange fur colors. His abilities include enhanced senses, claws, and healing, typically fighting with natural claws and fangs. His character design draws inspiration from wild animals and prehistoric predators.

• Key Traits: Enhanced senses, natural claws, accelerated healing factor
• Signature Look: Large feral figure with wild hair and minimal fur-lined clothing
• Primary Role: Hunting and terrorizing victims through savage predatory instincts

silver_samurai.title: Silver Samurai
silver_samurai.metadata: Honor-Bound Warrior | Tachyon Katana | Silver Traditional | Japanese Samurai | Swordsmanship | Honorable
silver_samurai.content:
Silver Samurai

The honorable Japanese warrior who seeks to achieve honor through traditional samurai combat

Silver Samurai is an athletic samurai build with armored Japanese warrior appearance that represents the intersection of traditional bushido values with advanced technology. His core motivation is achieving honor through combat, embodying the honorable Japanese warrior archetype with unwavering dedication to samurai code. He wears silver samurai armor with traditional samurai styling serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in silver and traditional colors. His abilities focus on tachyon energy and swordsmanship, typically armed with tachyon-charged katana that can cut through virtually any material. His character design draws inspiration from Japanese samurai warriors.

• Key Traits: Tachyon energy swordsmanship, samurai honor code, traditional combat mastery
• Signature Look: Athletic samurai in silver armor with traditional Japanese styling
• Primary Role: Pursuing personal honor through traditional samurai combat and swordsmanship

thanos.title: Thanos
thanos.metadata: Mad Titan | Cosmic Powers | Purple Gold | Infinity Gauntlet | Reality Manipulation | Cosmic
thanos.content:
Thanos

The cosmic tyrant who seeks to achieve cosmic balance through systematic destruction

Thanos is a massive cosmic build with purple giant appearance featuring cosmic armor that marks him as one of the most powerful beings in the universe. His primary motivation is achieving cosmic balance through destruction, embodying the cosmic tyrant archetype with the conviction that only he understands what must be done. He wears cosmic armor and gauntlets with Infinity Gauntlet and cosmic styling serving as his main powerful features, rendered in purple and gold cosmic colors. His abilities center on cosmic powers and reality manipulation, typically armed with Infinity Gauntlet that grants control over fundamental forces of reality. His character design draws inspiration from cosmic entities and ancient tyrants.

• Key Traits: Cosmic power manipulation, reality alteration, universal-scale thinking
• Signature Look: Massive purple giant in cosmic armor with Infinity Gauntlet
• Primary Role: Reshaping the universe according to his vision of cosmic balance

venom.title: Venom
venom.metadata: Symbiote | Alien Parasite | Black White | Web Powers | Large Teeth | Dark Mirror
venom.content:
Venom

The savage alien parasite who seeks to destroy Spider-Man and corrupt innocents

Venom is a large muscular symbiote build with black alien symbiote form that represents the corruption of heroic powers by alien intelligence. His core motivation is destroying Spider-Man and innocents, embodying the savage alien parasite archetype with predatory instincts and Spider-Man's abilities. He appears as living alien costume with web patterns and large teeth serving as his main menacing features, rendered in black and white colors. His abilities include symbiote powers and web abilities, typically using symbiote tendrils and webs that respond to alien intelligence. His character design draws inspiration from alien parasites and dark mirrors.

• Key Traits: Symbiote powers, web abilities, alien intelligence
• Signature Look: Large muscular figure in living black alien costume with large teeth
• Primary Role: Corrupting Spider-Man's abilities while serving as his dark opposite

sentinel.title: Sentinel
sentinel.metadata: Robot Hunter | Mutant Detection | Purple Grey | Giant Robot | Energy Weapons | Law Enforcement
sentinel.content:
Sentinel

The mutant-hunting robot programmed to eliminate the mutant threat through systematic detection and destruction

Sentinel is a giant robot build with purple giant robot appearance that embodies the technological solution to what some consider the mutant problem. Its core motivation is eliminating mutant threat, embodying the mutant-hunting robot archetype with cold mechanical efficiency and programmed purpose. It features robot armor plating with giant humanoid robot design serving as its main imposing characteristics, rendered in purple and grey colors. Its abilities center on mutant detection and energy weapons, typically using built-in weapon systems designed specifically for anti-mutant warfare. Its design draws inspiration from giant robots and law enforcement technology.

• Key Traits: Mutant detection systems, energy weapon arrays, systematic elimination protocols
• Signature Look: Giant purple robot with humanoid design and armor plating
• Primary Role: Hunting and eliminating mutants through technological superiority and detection

capcom_heroes.title: Capcom Heroes
capcom_heroes.description: Heroic fighters and champions from various Capcom game universes

captain_commando.title: Captain Commando
captain_commando.metadata: Space Hero | Energy Weapons | Blue White | Captain Uniform | Leadership | Retro Sci-Fi
captain_commando.content:
Captain Commando

The retro space hero who protects Earth from alien threats using advanced technology

Captain Commando is an athletic superhero build with blue-armored space captain appearance that embodies classic science fiction heroism and leadership. His core motivation is protecting Earth from alien threats, embodying the retro space hero archetype with optimistic vision of the future and technological mastery. He wears blue captain's uniform with captain's insignia and visor serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in blue and white colors. His abilities focus on energy weapons and leadership, typically armed with energy gloves and visor that provide both offensive and defensive capabilities. His character design draws inspiration from retro sci-fi captains.

• Key Traits: Energy weapon mastery, leadership capabilities, space combat expertise
• Signature Look: Athletic superhero in blue captain's uniform with insignia and visor
• Primary Role: Defending Earth from alien invasions using retro space hero technology

charlie.title: Charlie
charlie.metadata: Military Soldier | Sonic Booms | Military Green Tan | Dog Tags | American Military | Top Gun
charlie.content:
Charlie

The American soldier who serves his country through military duty and sonic boom attacks

Charlie is an athletic military build with blonde American soldier appearance that represents dedicated military service and patriotic duty. His primary motivation is serving country through military duty, embodying the American soldier archetype with professional discipline and combat effectiveness. He wears military fatigues with military dog tags and uniform serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in military green and tan colors. His abilities center on military training and sonic booms, typically fighting with bare hands enhanced by energy manipulation. His character design draws inspiration from American military and Top Gun aviation culture.

• Key Traits: Military combat training, sonic boom generation, patriotic service
• Signature Look: Athletic blonde soldier in military fatigues with dog tags
• Primary Role: Serving American military interests through combat expertise and sonic attacks

dhalsim.title: Dhalsim
dhalsim.metadata: Yoga Master | Fire Breathing | Orange White | Stretching Limbs | Indian Mystic | Spiritual
dhalsim.content:
Dhalsim

The Indian yoga master who seeks spiritual enlightenment through disciplined practice and fire breathing

Dhalsim is a thin stretchy build with bald Indian mystic appearance that demonstrates the spiritual and physical discipline of advanced yoga practice. His core motivation is achieving spiritual enlightenment, embodying the Indian yoga master archetype with transcendence of physical limitations through spiritual development. He wears minimal yoga clothing with skull necklace and stretched limbs serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in orange and white colors. His abilities include yoga powers and fire breathing, typically using stretching limbs and fire that represent spiritual energy. His character design draws inspiration from Indian mystics and yoga practitioners.

• Key Traits: Yoga body manipulation, fire breathing, spiritual discipline
• Signature Look: Thin bald mystic in minimal yoga clothing with skull necklace
• Primary Role: Pursuing spiritual enlightenment while using yoga powers for peaceful purposes

guile.title: Guile
guile.description: Male Capcom Fighter Air Force Major
guile.metadata: Air Force Major | Sonic Attacks | Military Green Tan | Flat-Top Hair | American Military | Honor
guile.content:
Guile

The American Air Force Major who serves the military with honor and sonic attack capabilities

Guile is a muscular military build with blonde flat-topped soldier appearance that epitomizes military professionalism and patriotic service. His primary motivation is serving military with honor, embodying the American Air Force officer archetype with unwavering dedication to duty and country. He wears military fatigues with distinctive flat-top haircut serving as his main recognizable feature, rendered in military green and tan colors. His abilities combine military training and sonic attacks, typically fighting with bare hands enhanced by sonic energy manipulation. His character design draws inspiration from American military and air force traditions.

• Key Traits: Military training, sonic attack generation, patriotic honor

• Primary Role: Serving American Air Force with honor while using sonic powers in combat

hayato.title: Hayato
hayato.description: Male Capcom Fighter Plasma Sword Warrior
hayato.metadata: Plasma Sword Warrior | Futuristic Armor | Blue Silver Tech | Energy Sword | Sci-Fi | Space Combat
hayato.content:
Hayato

The futuristic sword fighter who battles aliens using advanced plasma sword technology

Hayato is an athletic swordsman build with armored space warrior appearance that combines traditional swordsmanship with cutting-edge plasma technology. His core motivation is fighting aliens with plasma technology, embodying the futuristic sword fighter archetype with respect for blade traditions and mastery of energy weapons. He wears futuristic armor with plasma sword and tech armor serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in blue and silver tech colors. His abilities focus on plasma sword combat, typically armed with plasma sword and energy weapons that represent the evolution of blade fighting. His character design draws inspiration from sci-fi warriors and energy swords.

• Key Traits: Plasma sword mastery, futuristic armor systems, alien combat expertise
• Signature Look: Athletic swordsman in futuristic armor with plasma sword and tech styling
• Primary Role: Fighting alien threats using advanced plasma sword technology and space combat skills

jin_saotome.title: Jin Saotome
jin_saotome.metadata: Mech Pilot | Robot Summoning | Red White Pilot | Hot-Blooded | Japanese | Mecha Anime
jin_saotome.content:
Jin Saotome

The hot-blooded mech pilot who protects Earth through giant robot summoning and piloting

Jin Saotome is an athletic pilot build with Japanese mech pilot appearance that brings the passion and intensity of mecha anime to real combat situations. His primary motivation is piloting mechs to protect Earth, embodying the hot-blooded mech pilot archetype with courage and determination to defend his world. He wears pilot suit and gear with mech pilot styling serving as his main distinctive features, rendered in red and white pilot colors. His abilities center on mech summoning and piloting, typically using mech suits and pilot controls to call upon giant robots. His character design draws inspiration from mech anime pilots.

• Key Traits: Mech summoning abilities, robot piloting expertise, hot-blooded determination
• Signature Look: Athletic Japanese pilot in red and white suit with mech pilot styling
• Primary Role: Defending Earth by summoning and piloting giant mechanical warriors

ken.title: Ken
ken.metadata: American Fighter | Fire Attacks | Red White | Blonde Hair | Shoryuken | Friendship
ken.content:
Ken

The American martial artist who perfects his fighting abilities through friendship and fiery attacks
